text: Ada Colau Ballano (; ; born 3 March 1974) is a Spanish activist and politician. She was the Mayor of Barcelona from 2015 to 2023.Colau reelegida alcaldesa en una tensa investidura con los votos de PSC y Valls She is the first woman to hold the office.Amy Goodman, "From Occupying Banks to City Hall: Meet Barcelonaâ€™s New Mayor Ada Colau", Democracy Now, June 5, 2015. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Barcelona Category:Spanish LGBT politicians Category:LGBT writers Category:Bisexual people Category:Spanish political writers Category:Writers from Barcelona
title: Ada Colau
